backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing perâ€‘user build histories with authorization checks and functions to record and retrieve build activities.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind global styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with header, tabbed generator tools, history panel, and footer.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and state handling.
frontend/src/features/generators/ImageTo: UI for uploading an image and generating an animated video locally with configurable settings and history recording.
frontend/src/features/generators/TextToI: UI tool for generating images from text using local canvas rendering with options and history recording.
frontend/src/features/generators/TextToV: UI tool for generating short demo videos from text prompts using MediaRecorder, with controls and history logging.
frontend/src/features/history/RecentGene: Displays the user's generation history with icons, truncated prompts, and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/history/useBuildHi: React Query hooks for fetching and recording build generation history via the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/utils/download.ts: Utility to trigger browser downloads from data or blob URLs.
frontend/src/features/utils/imageGenerat: Canvas-based demo image generator producing abstract, geometric, gradient, or pattern images based on prompt hashing.
Canvas and MediaRecorder utilities to generate demo videos from prompts or animate images into videos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes identity state via a hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are defined in feature-specific directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the project's main CSS stylesheet.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming, colors, animation keyframes, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, requirements, and metadata for a multipurpose generative AI website.
